name: @ziadkh0/flow-comments
description: A simple CLI that wraps/unwraps flow type annotations in comments

scripts.test: ./bin/flow-comments add < fixtures/without-comments.js | diff fixtures/with-comments.js - > /dev/null && ./bin/flow-comments remove < fixtures/with-comments.js | diff fixtures/without-comments.js - > /dev/null

author: Ziad EL KHOURY HANNA
